group_1.textRight: We should leave. They're closing in a@moment.

group_1.textLeft: Oh...no, we still have 15 minutes left.

[chara:301601:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Ahh! What a pretty view! [chara:301601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:301601:cheek_0][chara:301601:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:301601:lipSynch_1]I've never come up@here before.
Since we're up here anyway, let's enjoy@it 'til the last minute!

group_1.narration: This coolheaded girl is Masara Kagami.
Soon after we met,@we started fighting Witches together.

group_1.textLeft: You don't mind fizzy stuff, right? I got you@a ginger ale.

group_1.narration: It's kind of a one-sided relationship...
Still, when I first met Masara@I could've never imagined it...
I never thought we'd be fighting@Witches together, like we are now.

group_1.textLeft: Oh! Look, look! [chara:301601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:301601:cheek_0][chara:301601:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:301601:lipSynch_1]Isn't that our school?

group_1.narration: To be honest...@My first impression of Masara@wasn't exactly a good one.

group_1.textLeft: It's right there! Across the highway!

group_1.narration: I wonder when we started having@these kinds of casual conversations.
